# usesFontLeading

**Instance Property**

Returns whether the typesetter uses the leading (or line gap) value specified in the font metric information of the current font.

## Declaration

```swift
var usesFontLeading: Bool { get set }
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if it uses the information in the font metrics, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

## Accessing the layout manager

- **layoutManager**: Returns the layout manager for the text being typeset.
- **typesetterBehavior**: Returns the current typesetter behavior.
- **hyphenationFactor**: Returns the current hyphenation factor.
